section_title: Review of COP/MOP 1 and COP 11 arrangements
sentences: The US and AUSTRALIA noted new information on participation of observer states since the Secretariat's paper (FCCC/SBI/2006/2) had been produced, and Chair de Wet said this would be taken into account.
The EU restated its position that informal consultations should be closed to non-parties unless parties give their consent.
enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
